metadata.title: CVE-2017-16820 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The csnmp_read_table function in snmp.c in the SNMP plugin in collectdbefore 5.6.3 is susceptible to a double free in a certain error case, whichcould lead to a crash (or potentially have other impact).

criterions.comment: collectd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
